ColourWords.Title: It's time, I'd rather, I'd better
ColourWords.Instruction: There are incorrect words in eight sentences. Click on the incorrect words.

Content.Sentence:
1 Jennifer had rather watch the ballet than listen to an opera.
2 It's so time you went out and got a proper job.
3 It's getting late; I'd better to call for a taxi to take us home.
4 I think all young children better have swimming lessons at school.
5 I'd rather not go to the dentist until I get over this cold.
6 Had you rather eat something now or wait until after the concert?
7 It's about time we go to Grandma's house. We haven't been for ages.
8 We'd rather you didn't talk about this in front of the children.
9 The meal's cold, I have better put it in the microwave for a few minutes.
10 I'd rather not leaving so late; could I catch the earlier train?
